TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. they start stealing your cheetos and smacking your mother! But they feel REALLLY bad about it! And give the Cheetos to charity. All the non poor people are now starving.

I wish I had some Cheetos.

Granted. You are now really poor and eligible to recieve two cheetos from the newly established Kerbal charity.

I wish to be happy.

Granted. You get so happy that you cause an overflow of your happiness level and you can no longer be happy.

I wish for a hamburger.

Granted but in the other guys happiness he ate it!

I wish for a fish. (this is all starting to make me very hungry!)

Granted. Unfortunately for you, I always eat when I'm depressed. You can thank mythbusters884 for corrupting my wish to be happy

After eating the burger and the fish I just wish for a toothpick.

Granted. The toothpick comes at you at several times the speed of sound and hits your head, killing you.

I wish for a bunker.

Granted. He was a very important man and his death spurred on WW3. You get a bunker fast!

I wish I was an oscar meyer weiner.

Granted. Fat people eat it.

I wish that MGS V: The Phantom Pain is released sooner, and that I could afford it +DLC (if any)

Granted but the development team rushes to get it out. It is worse than sonic 06

i wish for a new and better halo

Granted, but god* gets angry that you stole a halo*, and banishes you to hell*.

*whether you believe in those things or not.

I wish atheism was the national religion.

Edited March 13, 2015 by TheMoonRover
Undo edit

I meant the video game

- - - Updated - - -

Granted but all ethics disappear so the world is filled with death and std people will riot and have no feelings. Have fun

i wish for China to be a democracy?

I meant the video game

I know.

Granted, but then it gets invaded by Taiwan.

I wish countries didn't feel the need to dispute each other's claims of land.

EDIT: (And I live in the UK. The Falkland Islands still cause controversy.)

Edited March 13, 2015 by TheMoonRover

Granted they feel that all land should disappear so they nuke it all

i wish for the mun to orbit the moon

Granted. The Mun is just a string of ones and zeroes, so nothing interesting happens.

I wish for a glass of water.

Granted. The water is poisoned with dihydrogen monoxide and causes you to suffocate after you choke on it.

I wish for a gif.

Granted it illegal and your arrested

I wish mythbuster844 would get my sig

Granted. he stoles your sig without giving credit.

I wish that everyone in the entire world.. had bread.

They did, but in translating to multiple languages it became "bred"; 9 months later global population doubled.

I wish for double my usual salary this week.

Granted. It is given to you as severance.

I wish the exchange rate from $CAD to $US wasn't so terrible.

Granted, you now exchange $CAD for Flanian Pobble Beads.

I wish work was done fo rthe day.

Granted. You are fired/suspended with immediate effect, and have forfeited this years pay/your degree.

Lasts for lifetime too, no returning to that job/school. Your bad reputation spreads, meaning it will be hard (Read: Impossible) to get in anywhere else.

I wish I was omniscient.

Granted. Your brain wasn't anywhere near ready for this much information, and so it shut down. You will be in a coma for the rest of your life. If you can call it that.

I wish for a pretzel.

Granted. but they are not the kind you like! and they smell funny.

I wish for nothing!

Granted. You get a vacuum, which causes you to asphyxiate.

I wish for Squadcast to not be canceled today.

Granted. Squadcast was not cancelled, but it was announced KSP is stopping development. (And licencing prevents anyone from continuing independently)

I wish to visit ISS.
